name: Lazescape
description:
Made for the Indie Tales Game Jam

EPILEPSY WARNING: I'm not an expert in this, but if you are epileptic, i don't recommend playing this game, as it contains flashing lasers.

Introduction

do you know mirror rooms(rooms with mirrors on all walls)? yes? ok, but have you tried using a laserpointer in a mirror room? that is what this game does, more or less. You are in a mirror room with hurtful lasers all around you, and you have to dodge them.

Controls

the controls are very simple to remember, but hard to master. you use just your mouse, and you move it around, which flips the entire room(or just the camera if you see it from a technical perspective) and the player(hexagon, or whatever skin you choose) moves in that direction. i didn't need to explain the controls here, but i did it anyway.
